sn41.7:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma godatto macchikasande viharati ambatakavane.
sn41.7:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yenayasma godatto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam godattam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho cittam gahapatim ayasma godatto etadavoca:
sn41.7:1.3: “ya cayam, gahapati, appamana cetovimutti, ya ca akincanna cetovimutti, ya ca sunnata cetovimutti, ya ca animitta cetovimutti, ime dhamma nanattha nanabyanjana udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
sn41.7:1.4: “Atthi, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
sn41.7:1.5: Atthi pana, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
sn41.7:2.1: “Katamo ca, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca?
sn41.7:2.2: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
sn41.7:2.5: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
sn41.7:3.2: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma, ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn41.7:4.2: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
sn41.7:5.2: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
sn41.7:5.4: Ayam kho, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
sn41.7:6.1: Katamo ca, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanam?
sn41.7:6.2: Rago, bhante, pamanakarano, doso pamanakarano, moho pamanakarano.
sn41.7:6.3: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.7:6.4: Yavata kho, bhante, appamana cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
sn41.7:6.5: Sa kho pana akuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
sn41.7:6.6: Rago kho, bhante, kincanam, doso kincanam, moho kincanam.
sn41.7:6.7: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.7:6.8: Yavata kho, bhante, akincanna cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
sn41.7:6.9: Sa kho pana akuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
sn41.7:6.10: Rago kho, bhante, nimittakarano, doso nimittakarano, moho nimittakarano.
sn41.7:6.11: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn41.7:6.12: Yavata kho, bhante, animitta cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
sn41.7:6.13: Sa kho pana akuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
sn41.7:6.14: Ayam kho, bhante, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
sn41.7:6.16: Yassa te gambhire buddhavacane pannacakkhu kamati”ti.
